ygData.subject: Re: I heard about some equipment...
ygData.msgSnippet: i heard they took ghoulsbane off the lord and put it somewhere in lower guk. is this true anyone else hear this? Shada Silverleaf, Level 40 Bard, Mithaniel
ygData.messageBody:
i heard they took ghoulsbane off the lord and put it somewhere in lower guk.
is this true anyone else hear this?

Shada Silverleaf, Level 40 Bard, Mithaniel Marr


-----Original Message-----
From: Tony Butler [mailto:tbutler@...]
Sent: Sunday, May 30, 1999 12:30 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] I heard about some equipment...


From: "Tony Butler" <tbutler@...>

Yes, and the warden has the wonderful habit of going invis if left alone for
very long.

The nice thing is, if your group is good, you can cover both the warden for
gloves/belt and the lord for silver-plated bracers/GhoulsBane (for your
paladin friends) at the same time. I got my gloves and bracers while
helping some friends camp for the GB. =)

Linako Lindenlyre
Mithaniel Marr

>they are found on the warden in the prison in upper guk. the warden spawns
>in a particular spot every 3 or 4 kills i think, and he rarely has the
belt,
>which is a very nice piece of equipment indeed. i was thinking of camping
>him but it is a long tough camp.
>
>
>From: Carole Roth <galaxy4@...>
>
>A friend told me about some pieces of armor that can only be worn by
>rogues or bards. I believe they were called elf-hide gloves and
>troll-hide belt. They each raised 2 different stats 5 points each. These
>2 pieces of armor sound like a must have but I have no idea where to
>find them. Anyone know?
> BTW: I prefer to use fast light weapons over minos...Once we get
>dual weild it will save lots of stamina using the light weapons also
>(combine scimitar and combine longsword is what I have my heart set on).
